sections.title: Beta Launch
items: Exportable, themeable, responsive CV template.
Hydrate CV data from user-submitted JSON files.
GitHub-based "Store" repository as CV database.
GitHub-based "Secrets" private repository as authentication database.
Home page introducing features.
How-to guides for Template and Hub.
Submission form for CV uploads.
Email feedback on form submission and forgot-secret (secrets are sent only to the user’s email).

sections.title: Community & Feedback
items: Open Beta for first users.
Collect feedback on usability, submission flow, and design.

sections.title: Automation & Flexibility
items: Automated deployment scripts and guidelines for GitHub Pages and Vercel.
Refactor sections as reusable components.
Allow users to select and populate dynamic sections.

sections.title: Hub Improvements
items: Public CV/portfolio browsing and sharing.
Home page live demo.
Publish detailed guides, FAQs, and video walkthroughs.

sections.title: Security & Privacy Improvements
items: Allow users to revoke their authentication secrets and temporarily block access to their CV page.
Add user-friendly privacy settings for data visibility and analytics opt-in/out.
Save security logs on "Secrets" private repository.

sections.title: Analytics & Insights
items: In-page statistics (views, shares).
Integrate with privacy-friendly analytics.
Home page's stats section (total CVs, views, most viewed/shared profiles, recent activity).

sections.title: Ecosystem Expansion
items: Enable community-created themes and templates.
Allow users to embed third-party profile links (e.g., GitHub, LinkedIn, personal site).
Publish documentation for template building and contributions.

sections.title: Internationalization (i18n)
items: Add support for multilingual CV and Hub platform.
Community translation portal for UI and guides.

futureIdeas.title: Advanced Analytics & Engagement
items: Launch statistics dashboard for advanced analytics and insights.
Aggregate trends, top-used templates and engagement metrics.

futureIdeas.title: Plugin & Integration Ecosystem
items: Launch a plugin system for custom fields, analytics, or third-party integrations (e.g., job boards, calendars).
Enable embeddable CVs/portfolios for external websites and blogs.

futureIdeas.title: Community & Support
items: Run "Build Your Theme" and "Best Portfolio" contests.
Improve support channels and add live chat or discussion forums.

futureIdeas.title: Performance & Scalability
items: Optimize static site generation and CDN strategies for faster global loads.
Accessibility (a11y) audit and improvements.

futureIdeas.title: Quiz Tests
items: Add quiz support: users can take quiz tests on topics.
Enable the community to build and update quiz tests following contribution guidelines.
